reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater amazing, soft, and true blue in color, with one noting the cute curly edges at the ends. They describe it as cozy and comfortable. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers appreciating the oversized fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!!!
items.body: I’m in love with this sweater!!! The color, fit, material, everything!!! I will definitely be ordering more colors. It’s easily washable but I do hang mine to dry just in case! It’s thick, but not too thick. Very soft, and not itchy!! The sleeve detail is so cute too. Read more
items.author: The McClendon’s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy comfy and cute
items.body: Love this sweater, very warm cozy and comfortable. I got a lot of compliments. The sleeves make it look so cute with the ruffles. Read more
items.author: Gisselle Almonacid

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Sweater
items.body: Super soft and cute. I bought a small but returned since it was a little big on me. Read more
items.author: Taylor Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and cozy oversized sweater!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. You will love this sweater! It’s really soft and comfortable, and makes you feel so cozy. The ruffle detail on the sleeves is adorable! It’s light enough that you can tuck it in, but you can wear it untucked and it goes a little past your hips. I’m 5’6” and bought a S which is my true size. It is oversized so you could size down if you wanted to. I will say that I bought the white and it doesn’t seem like a true white, but is more of an off-white or slightly cream color. Read more
items.author: SheaJ

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great until you wash it!
items.body: Loved the sweater, but after washing one time it is not in good shape. I am so sad, because it is so cute on! Read more
items.author: Michelle Dirksen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Super cute and soft but runs a bit large, but I guess since it's oversized, it's meant to be. I don't want it as large. I'm 5'6" 164 lbs and bought a large returning for a medium Read more
items.author: Sylvie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars oversized and super soft deluxe material
items.body: really oversized but very, very soft and the blue I bought is such a really true blue and the material is so deluxe run to get this sweater if you like sweaters and the little curly edges at the end are so cute. Katrina knocked it out of the park. Read more
items.author: Truflady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and cute
items.body: Makes for a great classy outfit or a casual legging fit! Read more
items.author: Danielle Murphy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Wine Red, White, Beige, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Camel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
